"All living plants and animals are likely derived from two primitive species of bacteria, a mathematics professor at the University of Alberta has shown. Dr. Peter Antonelli and a former post-doctoral student of his, Dr. Solange Rutz, used an original mathematical modeling system and software program to evaluate and compare the two main theories of biological evolution."
 Researchers Show Evolutionary Theory Adds Up.
 http://www.spacedaily.com/news/life-04e.html
 
 Now, isn't that interesting!

"What we do is new and not a lot of people understand it yet," he said. "I've published in biology journals before, but most biologists don't read these articles because of the mathematics involved. We've got to convince [biologists] that it's worth the effort to learn the mathematics."
 
 I love that best quote ever.
 
 I don't see how this charges anything. Seems more proof for creation to me.
 Only the 6 dayers will get remotely challenged, and by now they should be used to it.
